author: Phil
content:
Albatross: dirty bird can’t keep their pants up.

10 Soaring Facts
About Albatrosses

When a young albatross
reaches 6 to 10 years old,
it will usually start looking
for a significant other.
Almost all couples stick
together until one party
dies, forming unions that
can last 50 years or
longer. Still, infidelity is
rampant.
http://mentalfloss.com/article/67870/10-soaring-facts-about-albatrosses

author: Phil
content:
One would think the Albatross or Dove, The Biblical story of
Noah and the Flood
tells of a dove
returning to the Arc
with a freshly plucked
olive leaf. Meaning dry land.
